newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss launch three-month money market claims.
newsitem.headline: Swiss launch three-month money market claims.

text.p: The Swiss federal government is issuing three-month money market claims to be paid for on April 24, the Swiss National Bank said.
The allocation follows the end of subscriptions on April 22.
The previous issue of three-month claims, paid for on April 17, raised 954.55 million francs and was priced at 99.591 percent to yield 1.625 percent annually. -- Zurich editorial, +41 1 258 7340
